mapper.select: select event_no, DATE_FORMAT(event_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS event_date, event_name, event_memo, icon_id from calender where user_no = #{user_no}

select i.invitation_no AS invitationNo, i.event_no AS eventNo, i.photo_url AS photoUrl, i.celebrate_date AS celebrateDate, c.event_name AS eventName from invitation i , calender c where i.event_no = c.event_no and c.event_no = #{event_id}

select fp.funding_no fundingNo, p.product_no productNo, p.title, p.price, p.brand, p.itemimg image from funding_product fp join product p ON fp.product_no = p.product_no where fp.event_no = #{event_id}
